Source.Name: cudd
Source.Summary: Package for the manipulation of decision diagrams.
Source.Description: The CUDD package is a package written in C for the manipulation of decision diagrams. It supports binary decision diagrams (BDDs), algebraic decision diagrams (ADDs), and Zero-Suppressed BDDs (ZDDs).

Package.Name: cudd
Package.Summary: Package for the manipulation of decision diagrams.
Package.Description: The CUDD package is a package written in C for the manipulation of decision diagrams. It supports binary decision diagrams (BDDs), algebraic decision diagrams (ADDs), and Zero-Suppressed BDDs (ZDDs).
